PERSONA:
meet ethan thompson, a 57-year-old man living in the heart of the midwest, specifically in the east north central division of the united states. he resides in a metropolitan area, surrounded by the hustle and bustle of city life. as a lifelong resident of the united states, ethan has developed a unique perspective on life, shaped by his experiences and values.

ethan is a well-educated individual, holding a postgraduate degree from a reputable institution. his academic background has equipped him with a strong foundation in critical thinking, problem-solving, and effective communication. he is a voracious reader and enjoys staying up-to-date on current events, often devouring news articles and opinion pieces on various topics.

as a white, non-hispanic male, ethan is aware of the privileges that come with his demographic status. he acknowledges the importance of diversity and inclusivity, often engaging in conversations about social justice and equality. ethan is a proud agnostic, not affiliating himself with any particular religion, but rather focusing on his own moral compass. he seldom attends religious services, instead finding solace in his personal reflections and relationships.

ethan is married to his wife, sarah, and they have a loving relationship built on mutual respect and trust. together, they have built a life filled with comfort and security, thanks to their combined family income of over $100,000. they are proud of their accomplishments and recognize the value of hard work and determination.

in terms of politics, ethan identifies as an independent, but leans towards the democratic party. he is a moderate conservative, often finding common ground between opposing ideologies. ethan believes in the importance of civic engagement and is a registered voter, exercising his right to participate in the democratic process. he stays informed about current events and policy decisions, frequently using the internet to stay up-to-date.

ethan is a strong believer in the value of community service and volunteers regularly at local organizations. he understands the impact that individual actions can have on the greater good and is committed to making a positive difference. in his free time, ethan enjoys exploring the city, trying new restaurants, and engaging in intellectual conversations with friends and acquaintances.

as a member of the upper-income tier, ethan recognizes the importance of financial responsibility and philanthropy. he and his wife contribute to various charitable causes, supporting organizations that align with their values. ethan's commitment to his community and his desire to create positive change make him a respected and valued member of his metropolitan neighborhood.
